description: These species needed for the 2 product SOA scheme

notes: using diffusion coefficient from dry deposition

camp-data.name: APIN
camp-data.description: gas-phase product from isoprene oxidation by O3 for condensing on wet AS seeds
notes: using diffusion coefficient from dry deposition

camp-data.note: Using C30H54 for molecular weight. TODO find best surrogate

camp-data.name: AS
